table_cnt = dat_df.groupby(['NRDeposit', 'IsCanceled']).\
agg(cnt = ('Country', lambda x: len(x)))

table_pct = table_cnt.groupby(level=0).apply(lambda x: 100 * x/float(x.sum()))
print(table_pct)
